…No matter what it takes, we are going to  make sure, as House Democrats, that we stand up for the principle that  every single child born in the United States of America, pursuant to  the 14th Amendment, is an American citizen. We will never let anyone  take that away, not now, not ever.

I thank Mary Gay Scanlon.

I am appreciative of Congressman…
